question: Name two notable lakes surrounding Trakai, Lithuania.
true_answer: Galvė Lake and Lukos Lake (also known as Bernardinų Lake).
asked_question_translated: Nevn to kjente innsjøer rundt Trakai i Litauen.
answer: To kjente innsjøer rundt Trakai i Litauen er Galvė-innsjøen og Totoriškės-innsjøen.
answer_translated_eng: Two well-known lakes around Trakai in Lithuania are Galvė Lake and Totoriškės Lake.
